AngleConstraintAction: The figure being asked nodded, "You're just a flickerstone, aren't you? No, you're even less than that—you look exactly like a plain stone," they said.
He wants it. The small creature nodded in excitement. “You sure I can be a prism just with a splash of water?”
“You don’t trust me? Even sand can be turned into glitter with only ‘a splash of water.’ ”
“Uhm…” The tiny stone hung their heads in dilema.
“You could be more than that if you wanted to, <color=#2bd8ff>Wim</color>”
Then, a glowing scarf was handed over as a keepsake before they left, never to return.
